src:
Partija protiv Partizana donela mu je MVP priznanje [VIDEO]
07 Nov 2019, 13:46 by Milos
Košarkaš Venecije Mičel Vat proglašen je za najkorisnijeg igrača šestog koal Evrokupa.
Centar iz SAD je u pobedi šampiona Italije nad Partizanom u Beogradu (83:69), ostvario učinak od 27 koševa (11-12 iz igre) i pet asistencija, za indeks korisnosti od 37 poena, što mu je donelo priznanje za MVP-a ove runde.
Pogledajte i 10 najboljih poteza šestog kola Evrokupa.




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Party Against Partizan Gives him MVP Award [VIDEO]
07 Nov 2019, 13:46 by Milos
Venice basketball player Mitchell Watt has been named the most useful player in the sixth Eurocup.
The US center scored 27 points (11-12 from the game) and five assists in winning Italy's champions Partizan in Belgrade (83-69) for a 37-point utility index, which earned him MVP honors these rounds.
Take a look at the top 10 rounds of the sixth round of Eurocup.
